metadata.title: CVE-2023-43114 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Qt before 5.15.16, 6.x before 6.2.10, and 6.3.xthrough 6.5.x before 6.5.3 on Windows. When using the GDI font engine, if acorrupted font is loaded via QFontDatabase::addApplicationFont{FromData],then it can cause the application to crash because of missing lengthchecks.

criterions.comment: qt6-base package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
qtbase-opensource-src package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
qtbase-opensource-src-gles package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
